judging_manual_login_step1: 1. Scan the QR-Code with your tablet or phone:
judging_manual_login_step2: 2. Check the top row if the device and ground are set correctly. It should be the device {{device}} and ground {{ground}}.
judging_manual_no_division: If it says "{{no_division}}", it means that no $t(division) has startet yet and you have nothing todo.
judging_manual_grading_step_1: 1. You see the first $t(common:starter) in this round. Enter the grade and click "$t(common:next)". The next $t(common:starter) appears.
judging_manual_grading_step_2: 2. Repeat step 1 until you reach the review stage.
judging_manual_grading_step_3: 3. Check all grades and click "$t(common:save)". You have completed the first round.
judging_manual_grading_step_4: 4. Repeat steps 1-3 for all other rounds.
judging_manual_grading_step_5: 5. You have completed all rounds. There is nothing left todo for you.
judging_manual_division_overview_content: To get an overview of all starters click on the middle icon in the lower row.
judging_manual_division_overview_close: To close the overview click on the "X" in the top right corner.
judging_manual_notifications: It may be that $t(common:notification, {"count": 2}) pop up. These inform you about changes during the current $t(division). As soon as you read them, you can press on the checkmark to remove it.
